name: Dee Walker
text: I was in Boston for business and needed a quick bite to eat. I saw this place and i went in. The lady at the register was very helpful and advised me of what was good to eat. I had the Korean beef with sriracha coleslaw sandwich it was awesome. best choice

name: John Szesnat
text: Very friendly and clean. They really go out of the way to make your experience nice.  It was a little busy but we did not feel like we waited a long time. Oh the food. I had a meatball sub. It was really good. Very large meatballs.

name: Randy Fermin
text: The place is clean everywhere except the restroom. The service girl was nice and friendly and so was the cooking staff. Except for this Manager lady called Diane who was screaming and yelling at everyone because of how busy the place was. I …More

name: Son Lam
text: Front desk was nice. Took for ever to wrap my sandwich to go. It was sitting on the counter for 20 minutes before it got to me. People ordered after me which got the same sandwich for there order 5 minutes before me. By the time I got my sandwich it wasn't even warm. Definitely not worth the money.

name: Ireiny Ghabour
text: It seems clearly that management has changed .. very slow , the new general manager lady is not nice at all .. it's always all customers fault not admitting their mistakes , incidents happen in front of me many of times . No customer …More

name: theknightly1
text: No clam chowder. Never been to a D'Angelo's that is not serving clam chowder. 3 stars cause the subs are still good and the service is okay. Kinda dislike the "subway" style lay out but that's a personal preference.

name: Eric Rafter
text: Diane & Linda are the best, you could not ask for a better team. They get everything right, every time. The service is excellent, overall experience is top-Enoch. GO TO DANGELOS IN WESTBOROUGH THEY WILL TREAT YOU AS IF YOU ARE FAMILY & THE FOOD IS AMAZING!

name: Anthony Dulan
text: Great customer service , restaurant was clean and my food was good as well.

name: Chris Froment
text: Hit or miss, sometimes they are poor when it comes to making the food in a timely manner in the order it was ordered, other times it's fine. Food is always good enough when you eventually get it.

name: Robert Dunphy
text: Do you really want to hear this because it is not good I went in to order a just a ham and cheese sub it took 25 minutes to get my sandwich 5 people came in after me and get their sandwiches before me the guys behind the counter all messed …More

name: Dawn Szesnat
text: Good food.  Friendly people.  Restaurant is always clean.

name: Pamela Keefe
text: I come here every week for lunch and it's always great!

name: jesse shaw
text: Food was good and quick and much nicer than I ever thought it would be.

name: Rick Siraco
text: Bread was hard, the number 9 was a mess. They should watch what they are doing. Have had number 9 there before was very happy but this time it was terrible.

name: B Pawlowski
text: Food was ok, but wait time for a sandwich was awful. Not the employees fault, there didn't seem to be enough staff to handle the amount of orders.

name: Laurie C
text: Sandwiches were freshly prepared and ingredients were fine. Seemed to be a lack of choices of bread and cheese. White bread and American cheese. But overall it was OK.

name: Susan Chace
text: The toasted turkey sub is delicious! Very enjoyable good and atmosphere.

name: Craig Capello
text: Steak and cheese or the number 9, you can't go wrong. It's always good and hasn't ever changed

name: Joshua Youngsma
text: Great sandwiches can be had here! Clean facilities and good staff too.

name: Lincs Melissa
text: The best sandwinches and service.

name: Barbie Massengale
text: Good service. Tasty steak sandwich.

name: Ed Burdick
text: Been going there for decades at multiple sites. Good place for a grilled sandwich.

name: Arianna Power
text: Ordered online, showed up after the time they told me, my order wasn't even started yet...the soup i ordered wasn't even in existence...no apology, no compensation... I'm all set with this particular D'Angelo's..no thank you.

name: Kevin Canali
text: awesome steak and cheese.  I love hot subs

name: Eric Ricker
text: They make subs closely resembling what I ordered the vast majority of the time. What more could you want?

name: Glen Harthorne III
text: Good food ... Long wait time during peak times

name: Samantha Avitabile
text: It's D'Angelos, order online and pick it up. Good food

name: Greg Cusato
text: Simple and easy sandwiches and salads. A New England staple.

name: Jack Canzoneri
text: I would get the turkey sub with tomato, mayo, lettuce, bacon, and cheddar cheese!

name: Mark Burke
text: I like D'Angelo's but my visit to this location was mediocre.  Ordered two #9 sandwiches and it took a long time for sandwiches to up.  When they did some of meat was burned on each sub.  Didn't have time to ask them to redo it.

name: Johnny Claud
text: Two lobster rolls for 1999

name: Tonya Morin
text: Mmmmmm

name: david faria
text: Great pulled pork sub

name: Rhonda Rappazini
text: Good Customer Service

name: Jason Webb
text: great sub shop

name: Tamara Bustamante
text: Delicious subs

name: Kerrie Topi
text: Great sandwiches

name: joe h
text: Great

name: Richard Grafton
text: Quality varies with franchise

name: Greg Tuers
text: It took 20 minutes after  I walked in the door before I got my food.

name: Jamison Pezdek
text: Slowest service you will ever find.  Everytime I make the mistake of going here I immediately regret it

name: Scott
text: Great subs

name: Em Kay
text: Service was bad, wait took forever.. Ordered online and they hadn't even started it when I got there half an hour later. Once I opened the bag it got worse.. the pita was falling apart and it was more of a mess than a meal.

name: Kyle
text: Not bad for a chain.

name: v S
text: I was first to order and 30 min later they started making the sandwich. They just forgot my order.

name: Chris Taber
text: 15 minutes waiting for someone to answer the phone and no answer.
